text:
Filming has officially begun.

Updated: Tyra Banks has taken to Twitter to announce the premiere date of the highly anticipated Life Size sequel, along with film's first official poster.

"#LifeSize2 premieres December 2nd! Are you ready to shine brighter and farther?" she captioned the image.

News that the film will premiere on December 2 as part of Freeform’s 25 Days of Christmas comes just over one week after Entertainment Weekly revealed a first look at Banks in the sequel, which you can see here.

#LifeSize2 premieres December 2nd!



Are you ready to shine brighter and farther? 💕 pic.twitter.com/ZVBuE12tcu — Tyra Banks (@tyrabanks) October 12, 2018

July 27, 2018: As Lindsay Lohan prepares to make her highly anticipated return to reality television with her very own Vanderpump Rules-inspired show centred around her new Mykonos and Dubai-based beach clubs, People has confirmed that according to a representative from Freeform, Lohan will not be making a cameo in the Life Size sequel.

"Due to the production schedule for her new reality show, she wasn’t available," confirmed the representative.

July 10, 2018: 17 years after Disney first released Life-Size, starring Lindsay Lohan, a sequel is finally coming.

Plans for a reboot of the 2000 film were first announced almost four years ago but now Freeform have confirmed the project will be coming to a small screen near you in December 2018 during its 25 Days of Christmas special. So yes, it’s a wait but it’s also Christmas themed, so worth it.

The original story sees Casey Stuart (Lohan) bring her doll (Banks) to life after a spell intended to bring her mother back to life goes awry.

While Banks has taken to Twitter to confirm she's set to reprise her role as Eve and announce that filming for the sequel has begun, there’s no word yet on whether Lohan will make a cameo or take on a role.

"Now filming: LIFE SIZE 2," wrote Banks. "It’s time y’all! You’ve waited long enough. Could not find one single woman more perfect to co-star with Eve than the magnificently fierce @franciaraisa. See you on @FreeformTV this holiday season! #LifeSize2 #ShineBrightShineFar."

Now filming: LIFE SIZE 2.



It’s time y’all! You’ve waited long enough.



Could not find one single woman more perfect to co-star with Eve than the magnificently fierce @franciaraisa.



See you on @FreeformTV this holiday season! #LifeSize2#ShineBrightShineFarpic.twitter.com/p3XKU0oN25 — Tyra Banks (@tyrabanks) July 9, 2018

Banks also announced that Grown-ish star Francia Raisa will star alongside her as a character named Grace Manning who, according to Freeform, is "the confident and funny CEO of Marathon Toys, a huge toy company started by her mother that is most famous for manufacturing the iconic Eve doll."

While we ponder what Life-Size two might look like, especially at Christmas time and how LiLo fits in, we remain hopeful the former Disney star will make an appearance given that Banks confirmed she'd been in contact with Lohan regarding the her role in August 2017.

"Lindsay and I have been slipping into each other’s DMs a lot lately," said Banks. "I think she’s very interested in returning. It’s about figuring out what that role is. I’d like it to be kind of robust. I’m not looking for a Lindsay cameo, I’m looking for her to have something pretty meaty in Life-Size 2, so we shall see what our writer comes up with.”
title: Life-Size the sequel is happening and Tyra Banks is on board

meta_data.author: Lilith Hardie Lupica
